archimate:Stakeholder.name: Vehicle Controller
archimate:Stakeholder.documentation: The Vehicle Controller role is responsible for the operation of the vehicle/vessel, integration in the traffic in compliance with laws and regulations and for safety issues related to behaviour and operation of the vehicle/vessel The role may be covered by a persion (supported by systems) or by a systems (in the the vehicle/vessel). Is the case for Connected and Autoomated Vehicles (CAVs), the role is covered by systems. Laws and regulations must be followed.
